LanguageData.AnimaTreeLinking.roles.0.label: 주최자
LanguageData.AnimaTreeLinking.roles.0.customChildDisa: Only adults can link with an anima tree.
LanguageData.AnimaTreeLinking.roles.0.noCandidatesGiz: 자연 유형의 집중명상이 가능하고 정신적 무감각하지 않고 정신력 증폭기 단계가 최대치에 도달하지 않은 정착민이어야 합니다.
LanguageData.ThroneSpeech.letterText: {ORGANIZER_labelShort} is giving a speech from the throne.\n\nIf all goes well, listeners will feel inspired, and gain respect for {ORGANIZER_labelShort}. If it goes poorly, the speech will do social damage. The outcome depends on {ORGANIZER_labelShort}'s social abilities.
LanguageData.ThroneSpeech.roles.0.label: organizer
